website_summaries.verdict: While the price might be too high for some customers, Nursery Project's Monitor System is a solid product with a creative and unique design.
pros: Nursery Project's Video Baby Monitor System has reliable connection, crisp two-way audio and a creative design
Plus, it has a lot of extra features
cons: For the high price, the resolution feels a little low, the camera's pan/tilt responsiveness is inconsistent, and the wrist monitor is a bit bulky

customer_reviews.title: It has very poor range for outside of the house
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has many flaws and isn’t worth the price. It constantly will disconnect and not be able to see into the room. Tonight it wouldn’t connect at all, so I haven’t been able to monitor my son whatsoever. It’s usb is faulty, I had to order a new monitor because the usb slot was too loose on the last one. It has very poor range for outside of the house. It always turns on randomly at night so I have to put it face down so it doesn’t blind me in my sleep. The pros are the lullabies, the big screen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a year
customer_reviews.text: Works great until it doesn't-then good luck getting someone on the phone to help you fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniferdesmarais

customer_reviews.title: can't use both parent units at once
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered this monitor because it had 2 parent units with screens. I was disappointed to find out upon receiving that only one can be used at a time. I rarely use the small monitor because you have to manually turn off the large one for it to work. Other than this negative fact, the monitor works perfectly, is very easy to use, and we have had no issues since purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The camera and screen are mediocre at best. It is not high definition and often loses ...
customer_reviews.text: I paid 299 for this product and have had it for almost a year. The camera and screen are mediocre at best. It is not high definition and often loses connection while I'm in the house. There are cheaper and better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Mel.

customer_reviews.title: Turns off unexpectedly and then new one doesn't pair.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor worked fine for a little while and then it would turn off on its own in the middle of the night while we were sleeping and I had no clue that it was off. Very disappointed. I messaged Project Nursery about it and they sent a replacement but now the replacement doesn't pair to the camera. The mini monitor works but the larger screen doesn't. Ive reached out to Project Nursery about the pairing issues but haven't heard back. Needed to buy a whole separate monitor of a different brand because of this.
customer_reviews.author: jbw523

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Range, picture isn't any good, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst Product ever. This product is as bad as many others. Charging doesn’t work and if you have a house of any meaningful size it has no range. Split screen is great if you're in the room next door. Otherwise this product is a huge disappointment. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Owned product 9 months. Never misused or abused. Hard plastic body of monitor is cracked in 4 places. Battery life is still acceptable, but noticeably worse than originally. Flip-stand on back quickly loses tightness and flops around loosely. Flip-stand hinge pin broke, became stuck inside monitor, and rattles around. Camera was great at first, but is now stuck in night vision mode, rendering the video unusable during daytime. Night vision was automatic, but now stays enabled even through power cycle.
customer_reviews.author: computerprep

customer_reviews.title: Not just bad, the worst.
customer_reviews.text: In no more than a few months we were already experiencing issues with the Project Nursery baby monitor. From secondary cameras not pairing or getting a proper connection (customer service offered zero support- except to ask me to follow the troubleshooting techniques listed in the manual), to dismal battery life (plugged in or not!). I am so disappointed in this awful product, & painfully regretful I spent upwards of $300 on the full system. I’m going back to my Levana.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Poor Electronic Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The Project Nursery monitor has not held up for us at all. From the start, there was a lot of trouble getting the charging cords to work. You always had to swap the cords, or position them in a certain way in order to get the camera to power on. Less than a year after purchase, the charging port for the camera (mini USB insert) completely broke and was unusable. Following that, the same thing happened to the monitor screen - the charging port came loose, fell inside the unit, and the unit could no longer be plugged in or used. I would recommend finding a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: All in all it's a pretty good camera
customer_reviews.text: All in all it's a pretty good camera! I like the smaller version I can carry with me. It was very useful during camping. I just clipped it to my clothes and had no problem using it. Although it is larger than I thought it would be but I don't wear it as a watch anyway so it's fine. I also chose this bc I didn't want it connected through internet in any way. That just creeps me out thinking someone else could possible hack into my baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: annie23

customer_reviews.title: great monitor great cust service
customer_reviews.text: i love this monitor. set up is super easy. just plug it in. the picture is crystal clear. we have had issues with the sound not working. i called project nursery and they overnighted me a whole new monitor, no questions asked! i would recommend this monitor. i gave it 4 stars bc we had issues with sound and temperature read (not being accurate).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two different parental units died before a year. Crap
customer_reviews.text: Crap- I have bought two units because I have three kids and like the 4 way split screen- not parental units died and would not charge before a year. Company will not replace because a of a crack in the plastic. Funny how it’s two different units have the exact same problem. Crap. The problem was they all of a sudden would not charge anymore
customer_reviews.author: Texas BBQ

customer_reviews.title: Awful.
customer_reviews.text: Im so disappointed in this. If you move the monitor at all, the power cord falls out. It dies almost immediately after the cord falls out. The wifi range is not great and constantly loses signal. Ive been using this since my baby was born in April (6 months ago) and I have two cameras hooked up. I can no longer choose to view camera #2. Its just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Awful overpriced nonsense
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work out of box - wouldn't pan zoom right, color from camera garbled in certain positions once it did pan, disconnected randomly every couple minutes from a foot away while doing initial testing.
customer_reviews.author: Sith

customer_reviews.title: and better yet, dies completely after a few dies
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work! Alerts are extremely unreliable, charges don't hold, and better yet, dies completely after a few dies! Couldn't even get it to turn on. Don't spend your money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product with terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Monitor broke within 7 weeks (handset would not turn off). When I contacted customer service, it took them a week to respond, and they provided unhelpful and irrelevant information. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She upgraded with her second baby. Even I can use it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality screen
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is a life saver. Great quality screen, great sound quality. I love the fact that we can "talk" to the baby through the monitor, which helps calm her down in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda lowe

customer_reviews.title: App is only rated 1.6 on Apple store for a reason. Total junk.
customer_reviews.text: Tried 3 of their products. All junk. Some wont pair with android due to faulty app. One died within months and their warranty department is terrible. Check the reviews for the app and hardware.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor has failed twice. The first time, it was a blank screen but I could only hear audio. No buttons would work on it. Nothing. Finally figured out how to take the battery out (and you need a star tipped screw driver) and it started working again. The second time the monitor permanently disconnected to the camera. Can’t get it to pair with the camera. Nothing. I will be sending this back and buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Irons

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well at first then about a month later the volume would tune out on the monitor. Then I couldn't get it to pair on either device to the webcam. Wouldn't recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and features
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and features. I recommend this product to some friends eyes closed. The big screen is very clear and the small monitor is super handy and very clear and portable.
customer_reviews.author: J.O

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Picture and wristband fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Crisp picture, ability to talk, very pliable camera for various angles. Bought it in part for its large monitor but haven't used that yet in 3.5 months-- thought the wrist mini monitor was a nice novelty but it's FABULOUS. It's all I use. I have one issue with it: there's no warning That the battery is timing out. It just shuts off. Design flaw, I think. We have a small house so range has not been an issue even from upstairs to downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: The worst baby Monitor System
customer_reviews.text: This device doesn't function probably and doesn't even work if you were just 5 meters far. What is the benefit of the devise when you can not even see your child if you are out of the room. Its waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Faisal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horrible range.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Literal garbage. Actually, I wouldn't even put this in my trash can,because my trash can is better than that. I'd bed my trash can could out perform the 3 foot range you'll get from this piece of junk monitor. Please don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy McCurnin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The monitor stopped working 2 months in- the smaller monitor never connected. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good but I can't get the second camera to
customer_reviews.text: I may have to return the item. The quality is good but I can't get the second camera to pair
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Love it: ) I am beyond pleased with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it :) I am beyond pleased with this camera and the system :) Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Upgrade from Motorola
customer_reviews.text: So far this monitor is by far my favorite. The ability to view cameras in multi view mode and be able to see them clearly is a must have for me. With 2 kids I need to know what they're up to at all times! The monitor is very user friendly and the battery life is amazing. Pros Clarity of cameras Ability to multi view Battery Life Auto Dimming Cons The monitor doesn't have a belt clip so it can get annoying to carry around Sometimes the cameras lag when panning No shortcut to multi view
customer_reviews.author: LeaKMiller

customer_reviews.title: HD screen is a must with baby monitors
customer_reviews.text: This monitor absolutely performs better than the Infant Optics DXR-8. Initially purchased the infant optics because i was heavily persuaded by the positve reviews. Camera and monitor were not up to par for the pricepoint. Wanting a more clear picture, i decided on the Project Nursery with a HD 5" screen. After I opend the beautiful packaging from Project Nursery, I was blown away with the quality and performance. Range is as advertised. Solid build compared to the Infant Optics as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: this is the best all around
customer_reviews.text: After trying may monitors and all their flaws, this is the best all around: great picture, quality of product, love the watch option, good sound, doesn't cut out as much as the others we tried, and great packaging! Signed, one happy mama!
customer_reviews.author: Jas and Bij

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality was great. We ended up having to return it though ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality was great. We ended up having to return it though due to the signal not being able to reach from the baby's room to all rooms in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummer of a product
customer_reviews.text: Very slick design. unlike many other monitors we've seen, this actually looks cool and not from the 80's. screen is easy to navigate and set up could not take more than 3 minutes. HOWEVER, if the signal cannot work in a small single story home, well it's useless. Totally disappointed with this product. wanted to love it, wanted to keep it, but for the high high pricepoint my jeez it needs to work!
customer_reviews.author: CV_B

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: So far this monitor has been perfect for us. We plan on buying more cameras for the house to use especially in the playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: packaging and monitor are all very nicely executed. Unfortunately for us
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers said, the camera, packaging and monitor are all very nicely executed. Unfortunately for us, the range just wasn't there. It continually lost the signal and the sound so it's going back!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Dunton

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor three months ago. At first I loved the monitor. The picture quality is amazing!! Super crisp images and superior night vision. However, the range is HORRIBLE! I've called customer service and they walked me through how to reset the monitor and camera units, but the reset didn't improve the issue with range at all. Whether I'm 10ft, 50ft, or 200ft away from my child's room with the monitor, it contstantly displays an "out of range" notice. Additionally, the screen image will freeze (as will the sound) and show a sleeping kiddo when in fact my little one is wide awake and moving around. For $300, I feel like this shouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: MMFOR

customer_reviews.title: it works great!! This would be a great tool for ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to keep track of my 86 year old mother. it works great!! This would be a great tool for any parent. You can talk through the cameras and play lullabies. Excellent low light capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak firsthand as to the quality of this monitor ... we bought it as a gift for our niece's first baby ... they requested it ... but what I can say is ... upon opening it and assembling it, they both said it was all they thought it would be AND MORE .... amazing was the word they used! Love every aspect of it!
customer_reviews.author: MaryMac

product_meta.title: Project Nursery 5" High Definition Baby Monitor System with 1.5" Mini Monitor - White
feature_bullets: 5” High-Definition LCD Baby Monitor with up to 16 hour battery life and the ability to record video and snap photos with a micro SD card (not included).
1.5” Audio Video Mini Monitor included, with up to 8 hour battery life, makes it easy to watch baby while doing laundry and dishes.
Secure 2.4 GHz static-free digital wireless transmission with range up to 800 feet with clear line of sight; Play Rockabye Baby lullabies, white noise and natural sounds.

Room temperature sensor and motion, temperature and sound detection alerts help set your mind at ease; be alerted if baby moves or starts cryingSecure 2.4 GHz digital wireless transmission with range up to 800 feet.
Remote pan/tilt/zoom camera with best-in-class infrared night vision; Ability to pair up to 4 cameras (single, split or quad view modes).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.4 out of 5 stars127 ratings2.4 out of 5 stars
